entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump Seriously 😳 when you don’t test people for Coronavirus of course umbers are low (scratch my head) this was a statement from my 11 year old grand daughter!! I’m like BINGO Well then why can’t the president figure that out?? I’m like that would be an excellent question for him.
